post.body: don't blame me for that, it was all Doug's doing. Now if we can keep my father in law off Twitter...
- too cute, great family addition!
rum cake is for tonight. On my way....
SO jealous of you. I'm at work and making lists in my head of all the things I need to do today. Why didn't I take a PTO???
merry Christmas cousin Larry.
more info needed. :)
like what places, Doug???? :)
I was expecting the response "Burn them!"
- 3:40 am and finally done wrapping and baking. I won't let this happen again next year. Merry Christmas. G'night/morning.
- candlelit midnight service at the church was beautiful. Just what I needed to get in the spirit. Christ the Savior is born.
- Christmas with the extended Snell family was nice, a bit exhausting with all the kids, but nice. Merry Christmas to all!
- Soap won't help the onion smell! It stinks and now I need to go to a family get together. Maybe if I stand near the rum cake all night...
- help! How do I get the chopped onion smell off my hands?
- to bake: rum cake, sweet potato casserole, herbed roasted potatoes and baked pineapple. Let the chaos and dirty dishes ensue.
- glasses for two more weeks, but no eyepatch.
- do you have the time, to listen to me whine?
- at the cornea doc again to see if my infection is all cleared up or if I have to wear glasses for another week. Wish me luck.
- how did it get to be Christmas eve?did it sneak up on me while I was sleeping?
- putting fresh coffee in the coffee pot and hitting the timer button; one of my simple pleasures.
- getting into my gift wrapping groove (trying).
